Detailed Description

cvmx_stx::_spi4_dat

STX_SPI4_DAT - Spi4 datapath channel control register

Notes: Restrictions: * DATA_MAX_T must be in MOD 4 cycles

* DATA_MAX_T must at least 0x20

* DATA_MAX_T == 0 or ALPHA == 0 will disable the training sequnce

* If STX_ARB_CTL[MINTRN] is set, then training cycles will stall waiting for min bursts to complete. In the worst case, this will add the entire min burst transmission time to the interval between trainging sequence. The observed MAX_T on the Spi4 bus will be...

STX_SPI4_DAT[MAX_T] + (STX_MIN_BST[MINB] * 4)

If STX_ARB_CTL[MINTRN] is set in Spi4 mode, then the data_max_t parameter will have to be adjusted. Please see the STX_SPI4_DAT[MAX_T] section for additional information. In addition, the min_burst can only be guaranteed on the initial data burst of a given packet (i.e. the first data burst which contains the SOP tick). All subsequent bursts could be truncated by training sequences at any point during transmission and could be arbitrarily small. This mode is only for use in Spi4 mode.
